articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp wants to experience big finals “more often” with Liverpool after their Carabao Cup success, which he has compared to their Champions League triumph of 2019.

articles.title: Manchester City defender Ruben Dias ruled out for up to SIX WEEKS with a hamstring injury - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dias sustained a hamstring injury during Tuesday's FA Cup victory at Peterborough and Pep Guardiola revealed on Friday that the 24-year-old is set for a spell on the sidelines.
articles.content:
Manchester City have been dealt a title blow with Ruben Dias facing up to six weeks out starting with Sunday's derby against Manchester United.
